text.text: Welcome to our study! We are the Imagineering Institute, Iskandar, Malaysia, and the Crossmodal Research Laboratory, Department of Experimental Psychology, Oxford University. We are interested in understanding how people associate information across the senses. If you decide to take part in this experiment, you will be asked to match a variety of packaging shapes to tastes. We hope you enjoy it. Your participation is very important to us.

TRIAL.text: <.text>Before we begin, please read the below: By clicking 'I CONSENT' you indicate you have consented to take part. If you decide to take part in this experiment, you will be told specific links between tastes and packaging shapes and will be asked to respond according to such links At the end of the study we will tell you more about the purpose of the study and why we are doing this research. You can also contact the researchers - Dr Carlos Velasco (carlos@imagineeringinstitute.org) or Dr Andy Woods (andy.woods@psy.ox.ac.uk) for further information at a later date if you wish.
